course_title: Biocultural Diversity: Language, Community, and Environment

sections.comments: This section is for undergraduate students only. Grad students please email cis.program@ubc.ca for information on registration.

This is a waitlist section for undergraduate students - only register in this section if FNEL 381 001 is full. Registering in the waitlist section does not guarantee you a spot in the course. When spots open up you will be moved from this section to the actual course. Email cis.program@ubc.ca with any questions.

description: Critical exploration of the links between linguistic, biological and cultural diversity; including connections with linguistic relativity, linguistic identity, language and place; and strategies for collective, interdisciplinary action to promote and support the protection of languages, cultures, and the environment.
